body:
Comment 2: 
The default format string is a clumsy one whose sole merit is that it represents all the
pieces of the value. Few uses need that property alone. A better approach is to choose a
format that meets your needs (say, RFC3999Nano) and use that explicitly. The only reason
to publish this as a constant is to parse a default value again. If you're parsing, it's
better to be clear about what you're printing too.
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
